name: WGJ06 - Troll-A-Ball Maze
description:
Another incomplete Weekly Game Jam.  Work got the better of me this week, so I didn't even finish the maze for level 1.  That said, it's at a runnable stopping point, so here it is. 

Again, I'd like to come back and add features, etc.  I might start doing skip weeks just for the games I want to finish.
